name: INFECTED - Super Soldier Project
description:
A police officer goes to investigate an old house where he hears reports of noises and screams, a team was sent before him and they didn't give any feedback, something macabre awaits this police officer.
Zombies, monsters from experiments gone wrong and a deadly virus for humans, this mission stopped being a mere report and became an operation to save an entire city from a deadly virus.

• Explore the House – A third-person horror game with scary visuals.
• Gameplay and Puzzles - Based on great classic Horror games.
• Innovative story - Despite being inspired by other games, Infected has a unique plot created exclusively for the game's story. • Survive the horrors – Scavenge for supplies and weapons to stay alive as you run, hide, or fight strange creatures.
• Unravel the mystery of the abandoned house – Secrets will reveal themselves as you progress on your journey.
• Read texts and documents scattered around the scene to understand what happened in this house.

A bizarre mystery awaits you in this Horror game, help Gabriel on this journey.
